description.fr: Vaincre tous les Bouftous. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} {ATvalue:po,percent,+} aux Bouftous. \--- Lorsqu'un Bouftou subit une {%Attack} Il déclenche {bounce:bs} qui touche tous les personnages.
description.en: Defeat all the Gobballs. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} {ATvalue:po,percent,+} to Gobballs. \--- When a Gobball endures an {%Attack} It triggers a {bounce:bs} that hits all characters.
description.es: Vencer a todos los jalatós. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} {ATvalue:po,percent,+} a los jalatós. \--- Cuando un jalató sufre un {%Attack} Activa {bounce:bs} que alcanzan a todos los personajes.
description.de: Alle Fresssäcke besiegen. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} {ATvalue:po,percent,+} für die Fresssäcke. \--- Wenn ein Fresssack Ziel von einem {%Attack} wird: Löst {bounce:bs} aus, das alle Charaktere trifft.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Papatudos. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} {ATvalue:po,percent,+} aos Papatudos. \--- Quando Papatudo sofre um {%Attack} Ele aciona um {bounce:bs} que atinge todos os personagens.
